// sample1, ST
0011000000000000
1111000000100101

// sample2
0011000000000000
0010000000001000
0101010010100000
0001011000000000
0001100011000011
0101001011000100
0101001001000000
0000010000000001
0001010010100001
1111000000100101
0001001000110100


// NOT R1 R2 111111 // R1 = NOT(R2) = NOT(x7777) = x8888
1001001010111111
1111000000100101

// R0 = NOT(R0)
1001000000111111
1111000000100101

// ADD R1, R2, R3 // R1 = R2 + R3 = 0x7777 + 0x7777 = 0xEEEE
// ADD R5, R6, 0x04 // R5 = 0x7777 + 0x0C = 0x7783
0001001010000011
0001101110101100
1111000000100101

/* Results: 
R0 = x7777
R1 = xEEEE
R2 = x7777
R3 = x7777
R4 = x7777
R5 = x7783
R6 = x7777
R7 = x7777
*/

// (Continue) AND R2, R2, R1 // R2 = x7777 & xEEEE = x6666
0001001010000011
0001101110101100
0101010010000001
1111000000100101

/* Results: 
R0 = x7777
R1 = xEEEE
R2 = x6666
R3 = x7777
R4 = x7777
R5 = x7783
R6 = x7777
R7 = x7777
*/


0001001010000011
0001101110101100
0101010010000001
1001000000111111
1111000000100101
/* Result
R0 = x8888
R1 = xEEEE
R2 = x6666
R3 = x7777
R4 = x7777
R5 = x7783
R6 = x7777
R7 = x7777
Total number of instructions: 5
*/
